content.en_US:
Advanced version of the [[firebox|Firebox]], an [[external heat source|External Heat Source]]. Burns 5x hotter, but uses up fuel 8x quicker, making it less eficient. Heating ovens have a copper contact at the bottom, allowing them to be stacked, however they only receive heat from below at half efficiency.

Placing an [[ashpit|Ashpit]] under it will capture ashes, which can be burned again or recycled.
